com.dev.yvgenijsharovskij.n5kanjiandkanjistoryquiz.util

Class ExpandableListViewPreference

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v7.preference.Preference
      • com.dev.yvgenijsharovskij.n5kanjiandkanjistoryquiz.util.ExpandableListViewPreference
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<android.support.v7.preference.Preference>

    public class ExpandableListViewPreference
extends android.support.v7.preference.Preference
    Shows a Preference in the PreferenceScreen, in the QNAPreferencesFragment, composed of:
    • two ExpandableListViews for question and answer type selection
    • an ImageView swap icon in-between the two ExpandableListViews to interchange their values
    • isDuplicate TextView notification to show that duplicate QNA type selection is not possible, which is made visible when isChildSelectorValid(int, int) returns false.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Yvgenij Sharovskij
    See Also:
    Preference

    • Constructor Detail

      • ExpandableListViewPreference

        public ExpandableListViewPreference(android.content.Context context,
                                    android.util.AttributeSet attrs)
        Constructor that is called when inflating a Preference from XML. This is called when a Preference is being constructed from an XML file, supplying attributes that were specified in the XML file. This version uses a default style of 0, so the only attribute values applied are those in the Context's Theme and the given AttributeSet.
        Parameters:
        context - The Context this is associated with, through which it can access the current theme, resources, SharedPreferences, etc.
        attrs - The attributes of the XML tag that is inflating the preference.

    • Method Detail

      • onBindViewHolder

        public void onBindViewHolder(android.support.v7.preference.PreferenceViewHolder holder)
        Binds the created View to the data for this Preference.
        Overrides:
        onBindViewHolder in class android.support.v7.preference.Preference
        Parameters:
        holder - The ViewHolder that provides references to the views to fill in. These views will be recycled, so a reference to them should not be held after this method returns.
